name: Planet Stronghold: Colonial Defense
description: PSCD is a sci-fi collectible card game (with over 120 unique cards) mixed with visual novel gameplay. Features beautiful hand painted art, romance for all tastes, adjustable difficulty. Play as male or female protagonist.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 1Ghz Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 100 MB available space
